channel.title: iPhone - White Screen
channel.description:
My other iPhone which broke about 2 months ago has a problem whereby it just displays a white screen when turned on, I have plugged it into iTunes and it recognises it, but continues to display the white screen. I have tried holding the power on/off and home button for 10 seconds, restoring the iPhone, draining it so it has no battery and then charging it up but no luck.
I have looked at many YouTube videos with the "white screen of death solution" title, but no avail.
Any advice/tips/hints/links would be useful, thanks.
EDIT: I am still able to use the phone, but I cannot see any of the icons, I.e. I can take a screenshot, unlock the phone etc etc.

item.title: iPhone - White Screen
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:
@dragonfire455 wrote:

You bought an iPhone. There’s your problem.

Read full topic

[/quote]

yes, The apple store said £139 to get a fully new replacement[/quote]
yeah they’re cunts like that you’ll be able to get it fixed by a repair shop for a fuckload cheaper

item.title: iPhone - White Screen
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:7, topic:342329”]What if you put android on it?

http://linuxoniphone.blogspot.com/

If it’s a software problem, that will fix it, if it’s a hardware problem it probably won’t. Meh.[/quote]

If iTunes recognizes it and starts the sync when it’s plugged in, it’s a hardware problem

But I’ve got a Samsung Moment and an itouch, I’m going to try installing Android now, haha.

Edit: Nevermind, thought it was available to the public lol.

Read full topic

item.title: iPhone - White Screen

item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

item.title: iPhone - White Screen
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

What if you put android on it?

http://linuxoniphone.blogspot.com/

If it’s a software problem, that will fix it, if it’s a hardware problem it probably won’t. Meh.

Read full topic

item.title: iPhone - White Screen
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

ye I was thinking it would be something todo with how the iphone converts the data to an image, though I have booked to see the apple store tomorrow about it. don’t really want to pay them like 200 quid to fix it though when the phone isn’t worth more than that.

Read full topic

item.title: iPhone - White Screen
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

Sounds like a problem with the LCD. iirc the >=3g iphones have a replaceable digitizer and you can get one for about $70.

Read full topic

nade:

Why don’t you just go to an Apple store and have a guy take it apart and look at it? My Itouch was fucked, they fixed it on site.

They’ll either fix it there or they’ll send it off to Apple, if its in warranty they’ll do it free.
